RADIO STATION WUOT
THE UNIVERSITY OF TENNESSEE
DIVISION OF UNIVERSITY EXTENSION
BOX 8-450, UNIVERSITY STATION
KNOXVILLE
Mr, 3i
August 29, 1955
Will iiuin
.h 1 or a.
'^■;S
Dear Frank:
Damn it; ireplte of all my good resolutions, which still hold, I missed
an issue. I've Ween out of town •visiting commercdal stations in Tennessee
for 3 weeks off and on, and didn't get your 18th letter until this morning.
I assume that the 20th of the mont$i is the deadline; would you inform
me If that isn't right? I'll certainly have an idea ready before the 20th
of September. Thai!®, too, Frank, for the De Toe queville scripts which I
received this morning. I'll get to them right away. I'm very sorry about
the missed deadline; I definitely didn't intend for that to happen, but this
travel is a regular August job for me.
Regards,
a.
